name: Carousel (Party Time! Hexcellent!)
description:
A unique journal for creatives (in development) by HXLNT. Runs in MS-DOS and emulated environments such as DOSBox.

There is no build available yet. Paying for this software now supports my development of it and signs you up to get early-access builds once available.

To learn more about Carousel, find me while I livestream development on twitch.tv/HXLNT.
